taskbody.context: In order to begin using your Katalon On-Premises license, you must activate it by following the steps below.

step.cmd: Access the admin homepage on the browser. For example, if your LICENSE_SERVER_URL is https://admin.my-domain.com, then enter the URL: https://admin.my-domain.com/

substep.cmd: Wait for Init DB to complete. It takes around 3 to 5 minutes.

step.cmd: Copy your Machine ID to generate your License Key.
Open your License Key file, and click Activate.The On-Premises license activation screen
Log in with your username and password. Make sure to use the same credentials in the .env file configured previously. Katalon On-Premises' sign-in screen

taskbody.result: Signing in will bring you to the homepage. This confirms that you have activated your license successfully.
